abstract: Op-Ed article by former Obama administration health care consultant Jonathan Gruber argues Donald Trump's proposal to scrap most of Affordable Care Act while keeping ban on exclusion of pre-existing conditions would have opposite of desired effect; explains why patients with pre-existing conditions would suffer more under plan than if law were repealed entirely.

headline.main: What Could Be Worse Than Repealing All of Obamacare?

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: By keeping only the most popular parts, Donald Trump would leave patients worse off than they were before the law was passed....
lead_paragraph: By keeping only the most popular parts, Donald Trump would leave patients worse off than they were before the law was passed.
